translations: 用熨斗将（花边或饰边）熨弯曲；熨成褶子；（在书的金边上）印压图案
（用来将花边熨弯曲或熨出褶子的）熨斗；装饰褶边

sentences.sentence: Ironically, none of this is yet of use to Dr Goffer.
sentences.translation: 讽刺的是，高飞博士还没使用过这些仪器。

sentences.sentence: Amit Goffer, an Israeli engineer, knows this all too well.
sentences.translation: 阿密特•戈弗是以色列人，工程师，他太清楚这一切了。

sentences.sentence: Dr Goffer says his aim is to enable paralysed people to lead normal lives.
sentences.translation: 戈弗博士说他的目标是让瘫痪的人们都在过上正常的生活。
